front.title: Requirements for Limiting the Rate of Event Notifications

abstract.t: All event packages are required to specify a maximum rate at whichevent notifications are generated by a single notifier. Such a limitis provided in order to reduce network congestion. In addition tothe fixed limits introduced by specific event packages, furthermechanisms for limiting the rate of event notification are alsoallowed to be defined by event package specifications but none havebeen specified so far. This memo discusses the requirements for athrottle mechanism that allows a subscriber to further limit the rateof event notification.
